headline: Invesco Ltd. Announces September 30, 2025 Assets Under Management
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ)1 today reported preliminary month-end assets under management (AUM) of $2,124.8 billion, an increase of 3.0% versus previous month-end. The firm delivered net long-term inflows of $11.9 billion in the month. Non-management fee earning net inflows were $1.1 billion and money market net outflows were $2.0 billion. AUM was positively impacted by favorable market returns which increased AUM by $49 billion. FX movements in the month reduced AUM by $0.3 billion which was offse
